revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DGL-4300 |revision=A1 |upc=790069272554 |asin=B0006TIA02 |fcc_date=02/27/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-G06 |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=RRK2003060017-2 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP3023 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV320DB-90EI |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W981216DH-76 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-G02V |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5213A;AR5213A-00, A21610C, 4104, CHINA; |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A;IP101A, 0437S15, FKG6634.1; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5385;BCM5385KPB, CT0432 P10, 722175 M; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=dlink |default_ssid_regex=^dlink$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass= |oui=00:11:95 |oui_eth=00:11:95 }} {{TagLine|Wireless 108G Gaming Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DGL-4300|vs_id=370}}
:10/100 WAN, 10/100/1000 LAN
"8WRGG06..2A1" is silkscreened on the board.
A later revision device may use an [[Alpha Networks WMP-G07]] :(FCC ID: RRK2005030148-1)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/index2.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=25840&pop=1&page=0&Itemid=54 On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (w/ high-res picture) *[http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=153&num=1 Review on '''Phoronix''']
